description: Central registry for domain bank seed files. This is the single source of truth for seed file locations and bank mappings.

science.description: Canonical scientific laws, concepts, and definitions

technology.description: Core technology concepts relevant to this system

language.description: Grammar rules, tokenization rules, sentence types

working_theories.description: Causal patterns the system relies on

personal_system.description: Statements about what the system is, what the brains are, and rules they must follow

governance_rules.description: Explicit governance rules (no randomness, determinism, Python-only, etc.)

coding_patterns.description: Deterministic template patterns for functions, error handling, etc.

planning_patterns.description: How to break down tasks, constraints, sequencing

conflict_resolution_patterns.description: Patterns for resolving conflicts and contradictions
